name: Crazy Rails
description:
MADE IN 48H

A Game Made in 48h for GMTK Game Jam 2020...but I had connection problems  and I was unable to upload it in time... I LOVE my connection. By the way, the theme was "Out Of Control" and, in this game, you have to fix the rails to NOT let the train go "out of control"!

HOW TO PLAY

The gameplay is very simple. You just have to click when you see a rail out of place and keep it pressed until you have positioned it correctly. The green arrows indicate the rail you can click on, be careful to click ONLY the rails out of place! If you play the game, remember to share your best score in the comments below :)

Have fun!
